.hero { text-align:center; padding:2.5rem 1rem 1.5rem; }
.hero h1 { margin:0 0 .5rem; font-size:2.1rem; }
.tagline { margin:.25rem auto 0; max-width:820px; color:#555; }

.grid { display:grid; grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fit,minmax(260px,1fr)); gap:16px; margin:1rem 0 2rem; }
.card { display:block; background:#fff; border:1px solid #e9ecef; border-radius:14px; overflow:hidden; text-decoration:none; color:inherit; transition:transform .08s, box-shadow .12s; }
.card:hover { transform:translateY(-2px); box-shadow:0 8px 24px rgba(0,0,0,.06); }
.thumb { height:160px; background:#f7f9fc; display:flex; align-items:center; justify-content:center; }
.thumb img { max-height:100%; max-width:100%; object-fit:contain; padding:8px; }
.card-body { padding:.9rem 1rem 1.1rem; }
.card-body h3 { margin:0 0 .4rem; font-size:1.08rem; font-weight:600; }
.card-text { margin:0 0 .7rem; color:#555; }
.pill { display:inline-block; font-size:.75rem; padding:.18rem .5rem; border-radius:.6rem; background:#e7f1ff; color:#0d6efd; border:1px solid #d7e7ff; }

## How to use
1. Click any tool card to open it.  
2. Read the short instructions on each tool page.  
3. Share feedback—what worked, what didn’t, and what you need next.
